title: Stupid Cup - Novel Updates
author: 瞳师
description:
Sheng Ran met a shameless person for the first time.

“You kissed me, so be responsible for me. That was my first kiss…o(////▽////)o”

Sheng Ran looked at the girl in front of her, turned around and left.

The girl chased up to her and shouted: “Sheng Ran, you bastard! How can you not take responsibility!”

Sheng Ran: “…” She just drank from a cup last night, what evil did she do ahh!>
